faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Resumyt uses advanced artificial intelligence to analyze and summarize YouTube videos. You just need to paste the video link and select your preferred summary format.
faq.q2: Is it free to use Resumyt?
faq.a2: We offer a free daily quota for all users. For unlimited use, we have affordable premium plans.
faq.q3: What types of videos can I summarize?
faq.a3: You can summarize any public YouTube video, from tutorials and lectures to documentaries and interviews.
faq.q4: In what languages is Resumyt available?
faq.a4: Currently, Resumyt can summarize videos in English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, and Chinese.
